casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Joe Willard WILLIAMSON, Jr. No. 187P19 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 11, 2019 Joe Willard Williamson, Jr., for Williamson, Joe Willard (Jr.). Lisa B. Finkelstein, Assistant Attorney General, N. Lorrin Freeman, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the notice of appeal from the North Carolina Court of Appeals, filed by Defendant on the 20th of May 2019 in this matter pursuant to G.S. 7A-30 (substantial constitutional question), the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals: the notice of appeal is

"Dismissed Ex Mero Motu by order of the Court in conference, this the 11th of June 2019."

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 20th of May 2019 by Defendant in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 11th of June 2019."
